PPLoc: http://www.jabil.com/privacy.html (for non-employee data). The Safe Harbor Privacy Policy applicable to employee data is posted on the Company's corporate intranet.
activities:
As described in our Safe Harbor privacy policy published on the Jabil intranet, Jabil US receives from our Jabil EU affiliates personal data concerning their employees for a variety of reasons including administering employment benefits, coordinating job transfers, and for other standard human resources functions.

As described in our Safe Harbor privacy policy published on the Jabil website, Jabil US also receives from our Jabil E.U. affiliates the personal data of employment applicants, site visitors, E.U. business contacts, and E.U. consumers for a variety of purposes including: for employment applicants, to evaluate their applications; for site visitors, to provide website services; for E.U. business contacts, to establish and maintain business relationships; for for E.U. consumers, to market and sell products and services.
address: 10560 Dr Martin Luther King Street N
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-Line, Off-Line, Human Resources Data, employment applicant information, site visitor information, and customer information.
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities (DPAs). Paid annual fee to the USCIB/Safe Harbor Account.
